WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED IN 39-14.40N 007-20.40E
AT 070500Z SEP. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
